subject: Interested in a demo of OpenClaw
body:
Hi there,

I'm the VP of Sales at Acme Corp and I'm interested in scheduling a demo of your platform. We're looking for a solution to streamline our outbound sales pipeline.

Our budget is around $50k/year and we'd like to evaluate within the next two weeks. Could you send over some pricing information and set up a call?

Best regards,
Jane Doe
VP Sales, Acme Corp
